app.input.email.helpBlock.notShare: We'll never share your email with anyone else.
app.profileInformation.text: Shown in services that communicate with other users
app.profile.picture.limit: The page length of the image is at least 200px and up to 1200px. File format jpg or png.
app.profile.nickname.text: The nickname is used for example when you publish comments to public conversations
app.interests.text: Choose topics that are of interest to you that will allow you to recommend content on different services or send notifications according to your specific choices.
app.topics.text: What kind of topics are you interested in?
app.areas.text: What do you want to follow about the areas in Helsinki?
app.decision.text: Do you want to know about matters related to the decision making process?
onboarding.welcome.heading: Hello new user!
onboarding.welcome.text: Welcome to test oma.helsinki service. Couple of steps to fill and you are ready to go!
onboarding.personalInformation.heading: Personal information
onboarding.createPassword.heading: Create password
onboarding.settings.heading: Settings
onboarding.settings.text: Define what kind of messages and notifications you want to get from oma.helsinki.
onboarding.messages.heading: Messages
onboarding.messages.text: I want to get notifications or messages via:
onboarding.notifications.heading: Notifications
onboarding.notifications.text: You will receicve a message/notification when you have got a message or something interesting is happening in your selected region. When do you want to get the notification?
onboarding.label.notifyEvent: When there is an event that i'm interested in
onboarding.label.notifyArea: When in the area that I selected happens something interesting
onboarding.label.notifySubject: When somebody comments on subject that I follow
onboarding.hint.weakPassword: Password is weak. Try use capital letter and what not.
onboarding.hint.ofAge: Some of the Helsinki city services require over 18 years of age.
app.services.related.text: You can use multiple Helsinki City services and certain third party services in your Helsinki account.
app.services.notLinked: Services that you have not yet linked to your account
app.history.text: Historical data about the use of services when you are logged in with your Helsinki account.
app.subject.interest: What kind of subjects you are interested in?
app.regions.interest: What regions interest you the most
app.decision.interest: What kind of subject you are interested in?
